document: Synthesis, Characterization and Kinetic Investigations of Heterophase Materials Prepared Using Group Transfer Polymerization by Ann Marie Hellstern Dissertation submitted to the Faculty of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy in Chemistry Approved By: J.E.
